title: What can I do if my phone update fails?
answer:
l   Download the update package for your phone model from http://consumer.huawei.com and reperform the update. For details, see the update guide for the update package.

l   It is recommended that you connect your phone to a charger before updating your phone. Insufficient battery power will result in update failure.

l   If you are updating your phone using a microSD card, do not remove or insert the microSD card during the update.

l   If the update still fails, restart your phone or back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings.

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
